meanings.meaning: sth you say/do to show you respect/admire sb/sth

examples: Thousands of people stood in silent tribute to the dead president.
Floral tributes were piled up outside the church.
The couple paid tribute to the helicopter crew who rescued them.
The prime minister led the tributes to ‘a great statesman and a decent man’.
Tributes flooded in when her death was announced.

meanings.meaning: sign of how good sb/sth is

examples: The bridge is a remarkable tribute to the skill of the Victorian railway engineers.
